title: Delta Faucet PAN35-SN Panache Robe Hook, SpotShield Brushed Nickel
features: Panache, a long lasting Delta Collection, with a sleek minimalist design, will help revitalize your bathroom accessories with coordinating 18" and 24" towel bar, robe hook, towel ring, and toilet paper holder options, and is available in a Polished Chrome finish.
If you're looking for carefree and comfortable design, casual bath accessories provide the finishing touch.
This robe hook will help keep robes and towels off of the floor in a upgraded satin nickel finish.
Metal formed by zinc die cast construction method for increased durability backed by a limited lifetime manufacturer's warranty.
This product mounts to the wall using our Quick Click system that is highly innovative and effective.
description: The Delta Panache Robe Hook from Liberty Hardware has a modern presence. The Satin Nickel finish complements this collection with its sleek appearance. This piece of bath hardware offers contemporary features with a refined fel.
